Stamford.Stamford Town Center: Stamford Town Center is a shopping mall in Downtown Stamford, Connecticut. The 853,000-square-foot (79,200 m2) mall is the eighth largest in Connecticut, with space for about 130 stores and restaurants. It includes a 250,000-square-foot (23,000 m2) Macy's, a 40,000-square-foot (3,700 m2) Barnes & Noble, and a 78,000-square-foot (7,200 m2) Saks Fifth Avenue OFF 5TH as anchors. The 1991 picture, Scenes from a Mall, was partially filmed at this center.
